Class PayloadSizeEnforcer

java.lang.Object
com.quietterminal.projectneon.core.PayloadSizeEnforcer
@PublicAPI public final class PayloadSizeEnforcer extends Object
Enforces payload size constraints for packet validation.

Provides configurable enforcement of:

  • Maximum payload size (default: 65507 bytes, UDP limit)
  • Minimum payload size (default: 0 bytes)
  • Per-packet-type size limits via GamePacketRegistry

Example usage: 

PayloadSizeEnforcer enforcer = PayloadSizeEnforcer.create()
    .maxPayloadSize(1200)  // MTU-safe limit
    .strictMode(true);

// Validate before sending
Optional<String> error = enforcer.validate(packetType, payload);
if (error.isPresent()) {
    throw new PayloadTooLargeException(error.get());
}

// Or use with automatic truncation warning
PayloadSizeEnforcer.Result result = enforcer.enforce(packetType, payload);
if (result.wasTruncated()) {
    logger.warn("Payload truncated: " + result.truncationMessage());
}
Since:
1.1

      Sets the maximum allowed payload size.
      Parameters:
      size - maximum size in bytes (1 to 65507)
      Returns:
      this enforcer for chaining

      Sets the minimum required payload size.
      Parameters:
      size - minimum size in bytes (0 or greater)
      Returns:
      this enforcer for chaining

    • strictMode

      public PayloadSizeEnforcer strictMode(boolean strict)
      Enables or disables strict mode. In strict mode, any size violation throws an exception rather than returning an error.
      Parameters:
      strict - true to enable strict mode
      Returns:
      this enforcer for chaining

    • useRegistryLimits

      public PayloadSizeEnforcer useRegistryLimits(boolean use)
      Enables or disables checking per-type limits from GamePacketRegistry.
      Parameters:
      use - true to check registry limits
      Returns:
      this enforcer for chaining

    • validate

      public Optional<String> validate(byte[] payload)
      Validates a payload against size constraints.
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload bytes to validate
      Returns:
      empty if valid, or an error message if size constraints are violated

    • validate

      public Optional<String> validate(byte packetType, byte[] payload)
      Validates a payload against size constraints for a specific packet type.
      Parameters:
      packetType - the packet type byte
      payload - the payload bytes to validate
      Returns:
      empty if valid, or an error message if size constraints are violated
      Throws:
      PayloadSizeEnforcer.PayloadSizeException - in strict mode if validation fails

    • enforce

      public PayloadSizeEnforcer.Result enforce(byte packetType, byte[] payload)
      Enforces size constraints, potentially truncating oversized payloads.
      Parameters:
      packetType - the packet type byte
      payload - the payload bytes
      Returns:
      enforcement result with potentially truncated payload

    • isValidSize

      public boolean isValidSize(int size)
      Checks if a payload size would be valid without creating a full error message.
      Parameters:
      size - the payload size to check
      Returns:
      true if the size is within allowed limits
